Package noppes.npcs.api.event

Class NpcEvent.TimerEvent

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
noppes.npcs.api.event.CustomNPCsEvent
noppes.npcs.api.event.NpcEvent
noppes.npcs.api.event.NpcEvent.TimerEvent
Enclosing class:
NpcEvent
public static class NpcEvent.TimerEvent extends NpcEvent

Hook function name: timer
Triggered when a timer on the NPC is done.

This event is not cancelable.

See Also:
